I've felt sick for hours, watching the news from #Paris fill my Twitter feed. How can I help make this world a better place? #ParisAttacks
The crisis in #Paris today is exceptionally sad. Apparently Nov. 13 is #WorldKindnessDay, but today it has been overshadowed by hatred.
@joe_warmington @JustinTrudeau @stephenharper Really Joe? I'm wearing outer space socks right now, and even I think you need to grow up.
